summary: This document discusses the arrest of Federal Deputy Cesar Del Angel Fuentes for agitational activities in Guerrero and his role in the Acapulco murders.
title: Arrest of Federal Deputy Cesar Del Angel Fuentes for Agitational Activities in Guerrero
recipient: STATE/INR DIA NMCC/MC (SECDEF) ARMY NAVY AIR CIA/NMCC NIC NSA OCR SDO AID FBI USIA ONE ORR DCS
